dcterms:description: The WS-353 dataset consists of 353 pairs of words along with an averaged similarity score on a scale of 1.0 to 10.0 obtained from 13â€“16 human judges. Word pairs are presented as-is, without any context.
dcterms:title: WS-353

dcterms:creator: Peter D. Turney
dcterms:description: The ESL dataset consists of 50 target words that appear with 4 candidate lexical substitutes each. Disambiguating context is also given in this dataset, but it is discarded in experiments.
dcterms:title: ESL

dcterms:creator: David A Jurgens
Peter D Turney
Saif M Mohammad
Keith J Holyoak
dcterms:description: The SemEval-2012 Task 2 dataset consists of an aggregated set of 3464 word pairs evidencing 10 kinds of semantic relations, used for measuring degrees of relational similarity.
dcterms:title: SemEval-2012 Task 2
